title: Proposal for the timtempleton pools
body:
I propose that the following platforms be added to the dracula protocol
https://niceee.org/#/
https://rottenswap.org/#/

Both are sushi swaps, with no premine, and with open source easily auditable code. Importantly, both are deflationary farming tokens. Nice has a better case than rot at being a truly deflationary farming protocol, but both do their job and maintain stable prices despite having good yields.
author: 0x7Fb7e28B8bbbA6A0C28c8Ac6a522C2FEFe44ee96
